Race.SummaryText:
PARISHWIDE PROPOSITION 
(TAX RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  RENEWAL OF A 10 YEAR 7.18 MILL PROPERTY TAX FOR MAINTAINING LIVINGSTON PARISH SCHOOLS AND PROVIDING EQUIPMENT THEREFOR.
Race.FullText:
Shall the Parish School Board of the Parish of Livingston, State of Louisiana, be authorized to continue to levy and collect a special tax of seven and eighteen hundredths (7.18) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish of Livingston (an estimated $1,965,000 is reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2009 and ending with the year 2018, for the purpose of maintaining and operating public schools within the Parish of Livingston, Louisiana?
of public schools in the District?
